scripts.cf:pages:dev:ops: npx wrangler pages dev dist --compatibility-date=2026-02-22 --binding VOIDRUSH_OPS_TOKEN=dev-token
scripts.cf:d1:migrate:local: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply steady_study_voidrush_prod --local
scripts.cf:d1:migrate:remote:prod: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply steady_study_voidrush_prod --remote
scripts.cf:d1:migrate:remote:preview: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply steady_study_voidrush_prod --remote --preview
scripts.cf:d1:studio:prod: npx wrangler d1 execute steady_study_voidrush_prod --remote --command "SELECT player_id, season_id, season_score, updated_at FROM voidrush_players ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 20;"
scripts.cf:d1:studio:seasons: npx wrangler d1 execute steady_study_voidrush_prod --remote --command "SELECT season_id, status, starts_on, ends_on, updated_at FROM voidrush_seasons ORDER BY starts_on DESC LIMIT 12;"
scripts.cf:d1:studio:anomalies: npx wrangler d1 execute steady_study_voidrush_prod --remote --command "SELECT season_id, player_id, event_type, rule_id, severity, score, created_at FROM voidrush_anomaly_events ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 20;"
